Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68446 169.11,1.71,-330.43 - Take [a small spoon], then follow the 5 rounds of patterns with 4-8 matches. These start as soon as you equip your [a small spoon]. - Always wait after each round for "Start" before your turn. Having the instument between you and Imadeus the pots are from left to right: Red, Blue, Green, Yellow.

Icon.Name: ID68445

Icon.Name: ID69662
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69662 2.58,0.00,-1.40 When he is the right amount of drunk (green outline) he gets chatty and can be persuaded to give you some of his top quality barley for the Brewday quest 'Brell's Everlasting Brew'. To get him into that state: 1. Sober him up by buying him a cup of strong black a coffee. 2. Count the dwarven ales you have Dwayne serve him, until he gets agressive in his tone or he gets a green outline (lets you skip to step 6). 3. Sober him up again. 4. Now order him one dwarven ale less than what made him agressive. 5. Then start getting him some gnomish spirits until he gets chatty (green outline). 6. Now talk to him about his barley.

Icon.Name: ID69663
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69663 0.01,0.00,-4.73 He serves the drinks to Jimmy: - A dwarven ale will get him drunken quickly. - Some gnomish spirits will get him drunken less quickly but he can't take many of them. - A cup of strong black coffee will sober him up so you can try again.

Icon.Name: ID69664
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69664 -7.43,0.00,-0.13 Leads back out to the "Bar of Brell".

Icon.Name: ID69719
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69719 202.63,-10.84,139.47 Drinking from this Stein proofs you chose wisely and you'll be teleported back to the Bar of Brell for the Brewday quest 'Brell's Everlasting Brew'.

Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69720 -9.95,-9.00,164.81 - Updates the Brewday quest 'What is That Noise?!'. - Offers the Brewday quest 'Drinks Are On The House!'. - For this she will hand you 5 [Hearty Drink]s that you need to serve to the Serilians after which you have to return to her for 5 more over and over. - There are 3 rounds in which you get more and more drunk when satisfying the customers, in the last round orient yourself by their names to click them. - The goal is to avoid any parched Serilians (deep red) from becoming very sober and to serve so many drinks to each of the 5 that they are all drunk (no color).

Icon.Name: ID70307
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70307 -71.60,42.68,9.14 Once you have destroyed 5 clockworks and closed the gates you can gather the necessary parts from these and turn them into partless clockworks for Redd for the Tinkerfest quest 'The Reticent Tinkerer'.

Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70308 -54.61,59.43,-45.97 Should you run out of cannonballs a new one can be created by pulling on this clockworks finger.

Icon.Name: ID70370

Icon.Name: ID70371
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70371 -2.15,-64.21,-189.67 - Searching the corpse of this ratonga treasure seeker yields a [polished Splitpaw ruby] from his hand for the Night of the Dead quest 'Night of the Barking Dead'. - Cannot be searched before the treasure seeker gear has been found. - After searching the body Thieving Hardy appears.

Icon.Name: ID70372
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70372 -4.92,-64.46,-193.13 - Updates the Night of the Dead quest 'Night of the Barking Dead'. - Appears after retrieving the [polished Splitpaw ruby] from Nekrasov.

Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70373 -52.33,-64.77,-225.34 Scaling level 0^ gnoll ghost. - Needed for the Night of the Dead quest 'Night of the Barking Dead'. - Spawns after talking to Thieving Hardy. - At 75% he becomes invincible and you need to defeat the mindless bonescavenger/bonedcrapper gnolls that spawn on the surrounding burrows. - At 25% he will spawn gnoll spirit totems at your feet, if you're low on dps it is advised to destroy these first.

Icon.Name: ID70374
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70374 -59.29,-64.78,-226.47 Return your [polished Splitpaw ruby] to the totem, to put the riled gnolls to rest for the Night of the Dead quest 'Night of the Barking Dead'.

Icon.Name: ID70387
